title: People Make the World Go Round – Bobby Hutcherson
comment:
マリンバとエレピにコーラスがふわりと重なる立体的なアレンジ。
名曲をスピリチュアルかつグルーヴィなものへと染め上げた一曲。

Layers of marimba and electric piano are gently wrapped in soft choral touches.
A classic soul tune transformed into a groovy jazz interpretation with a subtly spiritual edge.
